attributes.action: Make them pay their own expenses, living, daily or travel like other employees
attributes.additional_details: After all its a job and their choice to do it. If I took a job a hundred miles away then the onus is upon me to pay for my commute or to pay to move to my area of work. Why is it different for politicians?
attributes.background: Who else thinks they should pay for their own travel to and from their place of work? Who else thinks they should be forced to attend their place of work? Who else thinks if relocate they should pay their own rent, pay for their own food, their own daily expenses?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority makes decisions relating to MP's expenses and is independent of both Parliament and Government.

If you would like to contact IPSA to make this suggestion, here’s how to contact them:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
